Pitch Night

October 20, 2023

6:00 ~ 7:00 PM

Zoom

About this event

Interested in starting or joining a game project? Come on over to Pitch Night! Pitch Night is the time where game devs get to pitch their game project ideas and recruit interested members into their teams. Check out new or recurring projects, and befriend fellow devs!
The requirements for pitching are listed in the events channel. The Zoom link will be made public on Discord a couple minutes prior to the start of Pitch Night.
